hudson.model
Interface PersistenceRoot

All Known Subinterfaces:
BuildableItem, Item, ItemGroup<T>, SCMedItem, TopLevelItem
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractItem, AbstractProject, ExternalJob, Hudson, Job, MavenModule, MavenModuleSet, Project, ViewJob
public interface PersistenceRoot

Root object of a persisted object tree that gets its own file system directory.

Author:
Kohsuke Kawaguchi

Method Summary
 java.io.File getRootDir()
          Gets the root directory on the file system that this Item can use freely fore storing the configuration data.
 

Method Detail

getRootDir

java.io.File getRootDir()
Gets the root directory on the file system that this Item can use freely fore storing the configuration data.

This parameter is given by the ItemGroup when Item is loaded from memory.
